requestBody.title: Biz member reviews and updates booking status API Trace

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Routing to queue/review/workflow based on score/policy". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.
